metadata.synopsis: The player just dropped the supreme tadpole, the item needed to transform into a Mind Flayer to beat the Netherbrain! Pretty important stuff. The player will make a comment and a marker will appear on the map.
metadata.how_to_trigger: get the supreme tadpole through debugdrop it

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Slippery thing. Need to get a hold of it.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Not a good time to lose that tadpole...
